instructions.header: In this section, you will be shown a series of images.

body.human: You will also hear a verbal description of each image.
body.synth: You will also listen to sentences recorded using a speech synthesizer we are testing.

instructions.footer:
Periodically, you will answer some questions.

Be sure to remain focused on the center of the screen. Every so often, a "+" symbol will be briefly displayed in the center of the screen, and you will be asked a question about it. Please do your best to answer the question accurately.

Press the space bar when you are ready to begin.
